description:
I think I’m just an ordinary fun loving guy, I have faults and failings and I have some wonderful traits also. But it’s not a great recommendation for me to tell you about myself, why don’t you contact me and find out for yourself. 
I like to have fun and avoid uncomfortable situations. I am divorced and like to think I’m a fun-loving guy with good sense of humour and probably a fragile heart. So if you’re a flirt or a player please keep looking, I’m not interested thanks all the same. 
My original country is Australia but I spend as fair bit of time in the Philippines these days. I travel quite often and love meeting new people and exploring new places and new cultures.
